properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 14 at 2:43AM EST until February 15 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south gales to 35 knots and waves
5 to 8 feet expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest
winds 10 to 15 knots with gusts up to 20 knots and waves 3 to 5
feet.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Grand Haven.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 1 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY
